critter.name: Blue Marlin
critter.desc: The blue marlin has a distinctive angular shape and no scales. It is an unusual relative of the tuna. These mighty fish can exceed 13 feet from bill to tail. Some accounts even have it fighting with whales! No wonder it's a popular target for sport fishing: unlike most fish, it seems like a worthy opponent.
critter.quote: I caught a blue marlin! Listen to this fish. it's got a point.
